segments.text: I see a woman standing before the sink, entirely absorbed in her task of drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus seems so intense that she doesn’t notice the water spilling over the edge of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: As I watch, the puddle grows larger beneath her feet, and I feel a sense of dread creeping in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so unaware of the chaos unfolding around her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are trying to sneak cookies, and the boy is balancing precariously on a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe they think they can get away with this without her noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost comical, the way the girl stands there, reaching up with her hand open, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR
